de.pniehus.jalienfx

Class FXDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.pniehus.jalienfx.FXDevice

  • public class FXDevice
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all information about an AlienFX device and its zones. It can be used to access all zones of the device.
    Author:
    Phil Niehus

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FXDevice(AlienFXController controller, int deviceID)
      Constructs a FXDevice with the given deviceID and the given AlienFXController

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AlienFXController getController()
      Returns the AlienFXController that controls this device
      java.lang.String getDescription()
      Returns the description of this FXDevice
      int getDeviceID()
      Returns the ID of this FXDevice
      FXZone getZone(java.lang.String zoneDescription)
      Returns the zone with the give zoneDescription
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,FXZone> getZoneMap()
      Returns a Map with all FXZones of this device with their description as key
      void setDeviceColor(java.awt.Color color)
      Sets all FXZones of this device to the given color.
